name: Every Time You Lose Your Mind: A Film About Failure

Official sites: The Hollywood Reporter Profile of Filmm and Band - https://www.hollywoodreporter.com/movies/movie-features/failure-every-time-you-lose-your-mind-1236302921/
The Rolling Stone announcement of film - https://www.rollingstone.com/music/music-news/failure-documentary-hulu-trailer-1235352224/

description: Like a falling satellite blazing across the musical landscape, Failure flamed-out in the late '90s, their promising rise derailed by drug addiction. Every Time You Lose Your Mind documents their origins, downfall and rebirth.
